name: Unawakened (Mr.Lonely)
description:
A Challenging Boomer Shooter with Platforming.                                                                                 A ww2 soldier is on his way to heaven but the beasts from hell are in your way 

you also might wanna turn down your volume a bit beacuse of the music

Controls

[W,A,S,D] to move  [Space] to jump  [M] to go to the menu

Notes

This Game was Created In 1 Week  for Brackey's Game Jam!

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-8

Install Instructions

Download the Zip File Below

Open the File and Right click to Extract Files

Open the Extracted Files

Double Click on Unawakened.exe

that's it.
